content:
This article is about the Shayzien historian. For the seed shop owner, see Amelia (Farming Guild).
Amelia
Released4 January 2018 (Update)
MembersYes
RaceHuman
LocationShayzien
QuestDragon Slayer II
GenderFemale
OptionsTalk-to
ExamineShe enjoys talking about the past.
Map
Advanced data
NPC ID8180

Amelia is a historian specialising in Shayzien history, located in a house west of the four yew tree block in south-east Shayzien (Her house contains a water and range icon).

During Dragon Slayer II, the player is lead to her by Imerominia in order to inquire about Camorra Shayzien. She mentions that there may be answers in the Shayzien Crypts south from her in the Graveyard of Heroes, and to be careful as there are hordes of undead lurking within.

Date Changes
16 June 2021
(update)

Amelia has been graphically updated, no longer wearing Shayzien armour.
